msg.msgText: A failure has occurred at location {0}:{1}. The failure recording routine has been called.

msgExplanation.p: The IBM WIoTP Message Gateway server encountered a problem. The failure recording routine has been called with details of the failure.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the data provided by the failure recording routine to see whether a solution is already available. If a solution is not already available, contact IBM Support. Do not discard this data until the problem has been resolved.
